welcomeMessage: Dear {userName} ({userInstitution}), welcome to your Dashboard of the MORE project. Start by creating a new study or managing existing studies you have been assigned to collaborate on.

accessDialog.permissionWarningMsg: . Please contact your study administrator if you require access to this section.
accessDialog.accessInformation: -section can't be viewd. Acccess requires following permissions:

toActive.intro: You are about to change your study status to 'ACTIVE'.
toActive.warning: Changing your study status to 'ACTIVE', will make the study available to your participants in the app and set all your interventions and observations into data capture mode, based on their set schedule. Participants will be able to log in and participant in the research.
toActive.confirm: This study status change cannot be reversed, but there is the possibility to pause the study to make changes to your settings. Are you sure you want to set your Study Status to 'ACTIVE'?

toPaused.intro: You are about to change your study status to 'PAUSED'.
toPaused.warning: Changing your study status to 'PAUSED' will result into pausing all observations, interventions and data captures for the time being. The participant app won't be collecting data until the study is set back to 'ACTIVE'.
toPaused.confirm: Are you sure you want to set your Study Status to 'PAUSED'?

pausedToActive.warning: All Observationmodules, interventions, schedules and data captures will be available again. Participants will be able to participant in the research again.
pausedToActive.confirm: Are you sure you want to set your Study Status to 'ACTIVE'

toCompleted.intro: You are about to change your study status to 'COMPLETED'.
toCompleted.warning: Changing your study status to 'COMPLETED', will set all data capture, intervention rules and schedules to finished and no data will be captured anymore. The participants won't be able to participate in a completed study anymore.
toCompleted.confirm: This study status change cannot be reversed and the study will stay 'COMPLETED'. Are you sure you want to set your Study Status to 'COMPLETED'?

error.addTitle: The study title is required. Please enter a study title.
error.addConsentInfo: The consent information is required. Please enter a description.
error.addParticipantInfo: The participant information is required. Please entere a description.

placeholder.purposeInput: Please provide a short description of your research purpose for your collaborators.
placeholder.participantInfoInput: Please provide information for study participants. This description will be visible on the participant's app.
placeholder.consentInfoInput: Please provide information on the data that will be collected. This description will be shown on the participant's app.
placeholder.emptyPurpose: Purpose information hasn't been added yet. To add purpose information, edit the study details.
placeholder.emptyParticipantInfo: Participant information hasn't been added yet. To add participant information, edit the study details.
placeholder.emptyConsentInfo: Enter your description for the consent information.

deleteMsg.warning: A deleted study can't be restored. If you delete this study you won't be able to use it at a later date.
deleteMsg.intro: You are about to delete the following study:
deleteMsg.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your study?

msg.urlCopied: URL for '{title} (Id: {studyId})'  was copied to your clipboard.

description.study: Enter the base information of your study to provide basic information for collaborators and participants.
description.purpose: The purpose property describes the general purpose of the study. It will be shown study collaborators to give them information about the study and it's goals.
description.participantInfo: The participant information will be displayed on the app as the studies description. It should give them short information about the study and their taken part in it.
description.consentInfo: The consent information will be displayed on the app and has to be approved by the participants. It gives general information to the data that will be collected.

error.missedFieldsMsg: Please fill out the following information fields:

studyList.title: My dashboard of studies
studyList.description: This is a list of your studies and the studies that you created or that you were invited to as a collaborator.

deleteMsg.warning: A deleted study group can't be restored. All information and settings of the study group will be lost. The linked participants, interventions and observations will loose their group link and then apply to the entire study.
deleteMsg.intro: You are about to delete the following study group:
deleteMsg.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this study group?

placeholder.title: Set a title
placeholder.purpose: Set a proper purpose for this group
placeholder.emptyGroupList: Add groups to your study to use group functionalities. Your study groups will be listed here.

dialog.addRole: Please choose at least one role to continue or cancel.
dialog.addCollaboratorInfo: will be added to your Collaboratorlist.
dialog.emptyDropdownValues: Currently there are no roles available.

msg.delete: Do you really want to delete the collaborator?

deleteMsg.warning: A deleted study collaborator can be readded to a later date. He will loose his permission to edit or view any study data.
deleteMsg.intro: You are about to delete the following study collaborator:
deleteMsg.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this study collaborator?

data.title: Data
data.description: Data collected during the study will be visualized within this dashboard.

dataList.emptyListMsg: Currently there are no observations to track.

header.distribute: Distribute participants randomly to study groups

msg.deleteWithData: Include all data for the participant?

deleteMsg.warning: A deleted participant can't be restored. If you delete this participant you won't be able to reuse them later on. You have the option to delete the participant including all the collected data or the participant alone.
deleteMsg.intro: You are about to delete the following participant:
deleteMsg.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this participant?

participantsList.title: Participants
participantsList.description: This is the list of participants of your study. You can add or import participants.
participantsList.emptyListMsg: Add and manage your study's participants. Your participants will be listed here.

distributeMsg.intro: You are about to distribute all participants of this study to your study groups.
distributeMsg.warning: If you distribute your participants, they will be randomly assigned to the studies study groups. The participants will be evenly seperated, so that each group have the same number of participants. Distributing participants again after they were already distributed, will conclude into all participants being randomly assinged to the study groups.
distributeMsg.confirm: Distribution of participants can't be revoked. Are you sure you want to distribute this studies participants to your study groups?

observationList.title: Observations
observationList.description: An observation can be sensor data from a mobile phone, a wearable device or information gathered from a questionnaire. The observations can be assigned to one specific study group. If no study group is assigned, the observation will be applied to all groups.
observationList.emptyListMsg: Add and manage your study's observations. Your observations will be listed here.

msg.delete: Deletion of an observation can’t be revoked! Are you sure you want to delete following observation: ...

deleteMsg.warning: A deleted observation can't be restored. If you delete this observation all settings and configurations are lost and you won't be able to use it at a later date.
deleteMsg.intro: You are about to delete the following observation:
deleteMsg.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your observation?

error.noValidJson: Cannot parse properties. No valid JSON.
error.addTitle: The observation title is required. Please add a title for your intervention.
error.addParticipantInfo: The participant information describes the purpose of the observation. Please enter a participant information.
error.addSchedulerMsg: Please set the scheduler for your observation.

placeholder.emptySchedulerMsg: Please provide a schedule for your observation.
placeholder.enterMainPurpose: Enter the main purpose and intention of the study.

msg.delete: An deleted integration can't be restored again. Are you sure you want to delete the integration?

deleteMsg.warning: A deleted integration can't be restored. If you delete this integration it's link to the observation will be deleted and it's data will be lost.
deleteMsg.intro: You are about to delete the following integration:
deleteMsg.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your integration?

integrationList.title: External integrations
integrationList.description: An external integration can be linked to already existing observations to add and collect data from.
integrationList.emptyListMsg: Add an manage your external integrations, which will be listed here.

dialog.title: Intervention
dialog.description: Enter your intervention's base information and configuration. Add the trigger configuration and at least one action to continue.

msg.delete: Deletion of an intervention can’t be revoked! Are you sure you want to delete following intervention: ...

deleteMsg.warning: A deleted intervention can't be restored. If you delete this intervention all settings and configurations are lost and you won't be able to use it at a later date.
deleteMsg.intro: You are about to delete the following intervention:
deleteMsg.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your intervention?

interventionList.title: Interventions
interventionList.description: An intervention describes an action delivered to the app triggered by rules on data.
interventionList.emptyListMsg: Add and manage your study's interventions. Your interventions will be listed here.

error.addTitle: The intervention title is required. Please add a title for your intervention.
error.addTriggerTypeConfig: The trigger is required. Please add a trigger and it's config.
error.addAction: The intervention needs at least one Trigger. Please add one trigger.

placeholder.emptyScheduler: Please provide a schedule for your intervention

description.provideTriggerConfig: Enter the config for the trigger
description.provideActionConfig: Enter the config for the action

info.generalInfo: Provide a number, a list of numbers (e.g. 1,2,3) or a range (e.g. 12-14)
info.questionMark: No specific value (e.g. any day of the week)

event.setDatesDesc: Set the first occurance of your observation modul. This duration can be set from one day to any timeframe. The modul will be active during that time. Consider that the given time (if 'Entire time' isn't checked), will be the start time on the first and the end time on the last day chosen.
event.repeatDesc: If you repeat the set duration above, you can schedule it up to a specific amount of days or weeks. Consider, that the whole timeframe above will be repeated. If you e.g. want to repeat a set timeframe each day, you would need to set both dates above on the starting date, and set repeat to daily. The data capture will be repeated each day at the set time from above for x-amount of days.
